definition: necessitating a choice between mutually exclusive possibilities, one of a number of things from which only one can be chosen
details:
adjective
- necessitating a choice between mutually exclusive possibilities
= example: necessitating a choice between mutually exclusive possibilities
- pertaining to unconventional choices
= example: pertaining to unconventional choices
- serving or used in place of another
= example: serving or used in place of another
= synonyms: substitute, alternate
noun
- one of a number of things from which only one can be chosen
= synonyms: option
